meanings.definition: Not placed or situated in a particular position or location.
meanings.sent1: The unplaced book was left on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The unplaced chair was moved to the corner of the room.
meanings.sent3: The unplaced pencil rolled off the desk and onto the ground.
meanings.sent4: The unplaced puzzle piece was found under the couch.
meanings.sent5: The unplaced flower pot was hidden behind the bushes.

meanings.definition: Not awarded a position or ranking in a competition or race.
meanings.sent1: The unplaced team showed great sportsmanship.
meanings.sent2: The unplaced runner trained harder for the next race.
meanings.sent3: The unplaced cake at the bake-off was still delicious.
meanings.sent4: The unplaced horse surprised everyone in the final lap.
meanings.sent5: The unplaced artist continued to create beautiful artwork.
